reviewText: Dear J is a Moon Brothers film inspired by the C.S. Lewis Trilemma. The movie tells the story of an evangelist who struggles to cope with the unexpected death of a girl that he both was dating and courageously trying to share God's truth. God unsuspectedly uses all of those around J to help him realize God's key to his own healing... Suspenseful, quirky, and enjoyable - for mature audiences. Enjoy~
